DOC.detailed_description: Study design assess vascular benefit drink Cocoa rich polyphenols . Vascular bed study include kidney , brain , eye , periphery ( finger ) . Time course effect study healthy normal ( include elderly ) , also subject Type I Type II diabetes . Renal blood flow determine PAH/In u test clearance . Cranial ultrasound use measure brain blood flow . Retinal blood flow assess specialized ultrasound/doppler device . Peripheral blood flow measure plethysmography . Urine blood sample assay routine physiologic parameter , include hormone assessment , also presence cocoa metabolite .
DOC.criteria: Diabetes ( Type I II ) , without Hypertension , blood pressure < 165/105 Under 18 85 year old , woman pregnant able become pregnant , history heart attack , stroke chest pain within past 6 month , kidney disease , heart disease , severe high blood pressure control medication
